//1: describes your app and its dependencies
//3: updating this file will download and update your packages
name: starter-react
description: A small scaffold to get you started using React with Webpack

scripts.serve:lambda: npm run process-client; netlify-lambda serve src/api
scripts.build-all: npm run process-client; npm run process-server
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development PORT=3000 nodemon --experimental-modules server.mjs -w src/; ./watch.sh "npm run process-client"
